se.jguru.nazgul.core.xmlbinding.spi.jaxb.helper

Class JaxbUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.xmlbinding.spi.jaxb.helper.JaxbUtils

  • public abstract class JaxbUtils
extends Object
    JAXB utility methods to simplify complex JAXB-related tasks.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Detail

      • getHumanReadableStandardMarshaller

        public static Marshaller getHumanReadableStandardMarshaller(JAXBContext ctx,
                                                            com.sun.xml.bind.marshaller.NamespacePrefixMapper namespacePrefixMapper,
                                                            boolean validate)
                                                     throws NullPointerException
        Acquires a properly configured JAXB marshaller from the provided JAXBContext. 
        
  // Acquire the JAXBContext for the types found within an EntityTransporter.
  final NamespacePrefixMapper mapper = ...
  final JAXBContext ctx = JaxbUtils.getJaxbContext(anEntityTransporter);

  // Now acquire the marshaller
  final Marshaller marshaller = JaxbUtils.getHumanReadableStandardMarshaller(ctx, resolver);

  // ... and use it ...
  marshaller.marshal(someInstance, someOutputTarget);
        Parameters:
        ctx - The properly set up JAXBContext, holding all required class definitions.
        namespacePrefixMapper - A JAXB NamespacePrefixMapper to be used by the provided marshaller. Cannot be null.
        validate - if true, performs validation - implying that the resourceResolver must be non-null.
        Returns:
        A standard JAXB Marshaller for human-readable (as opposed to extreme compactness) XML marshalling.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the namespacePrefixMapper was null.

      • getJaxbContext

        public static JAXBContext getJaxbContext(EntityTransporter transporter,
                                         boolean isMarshalling)
                                  throws NullPointerException
        Retrieves a JAXBContext instance, geared to converting all class types found within the provided transporter.
        Parameters:
        transporter - The EntityTransporter which should be marshalled to XML.
        isMarshalling - true if the supplied JAXBContext is going to be used for marshalling, as opposed to unmarshalling.
        Returns:
        A JAXBContext able to marshal the provided transporter.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the transporter argument was null.

      • generateTransientXSD

        public static se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.api.collections.predicate.Tuple<Schema,LSResourceResolver> generateTransientXSD(JAXBContext ctx)
                                                                                                                       throws NullPointerException,
                                                                                                                              IllegalArgumentException
        Acquires a JAXB Schema from the provided JAXBContext.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The context for which am XSD should be constructed.
        Returns:
        A tuple holding the constructed XSD from the provided JAXBContext, and the LSResourceResolver synthesized during the way.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if ctx was null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if a JAXB-related exception occurred while extracting the schema.

      • extractJaxbTransportData

        public static void extractJaxbTransportData(Object toWrapAndPackageForTransport,
                                            JaxbConverterRegistry registry,
                                            List<Object> resultingTransportableObjects,
                                            SortedSet<String> resultingTransportTypes)
        Extracts relevant data from the supplied toWrapAndPackageForTransport object, appending the JAXB-transportable objects into the resultingTransportableObjects List, and appending the transport type Class names into the resultingTransportTypes List.
        Parameters:
        toWrapAndPackageForTransport - The instance from which transport data should be extracted and appended onto the resultingTransportableObjects and resultingTransportTypes Lists, respectively.
        registry - The TransportTypeConverterRegistry instance used to extract TransportTypeConverter instances, in turn used to translate non-JAXB-annotated types to JaxbAnnotatedTypes for transport.
        resultingTransportableObjects - The non-null List holding JAXB-convertible objects.
        resultingTransportTypes - The non-null SortedSet holding the class names of all transport types.
